subtitle: Voice-Powered Expense Tracker
shortDescription: Track expenses by voice. Just speak and VoiceBudget automatically categorizes and logs your spending.
fullDescription:
VoiceBudget makes expense tracking effortless. Simply speak your expenses and our AI automatically categorizes and records them for you.

**How it works:**
1. Tap the mic button
2. Say something like "Spent $45 on groceries" or "Coffee $5.50"
3. VoiceBudget automatically extracts the amount, category, and description
4. Review and save - done!

**Key Features:**

• Voice Input - Just speak your expenses naturally
• AI-Powered - Automatic categorization and parsing
• Quick Widget - One-tap recording from your home screen
• Analytics - Visualize spending by category and time
• Multiple Views - Daily, monthly, and category breakdowns
• Clean Design - Minimalist, distraction-free interface

**Categories include:**
Food & Dining, Transport, Shopping, Entertainment, Bills & Utilities, Health, Travel, Education, and more.

**Privacy First:**
Your financial data stays private. Voice recordings are processed securely and not stored after parsing.

Perfect for:
- Busy professionals who hate manual data entry
- Anyone who wants to understand their spending habits
- People who always forget to log expenses

Start tracking your expenses the easy way. Download VoiceBudget today!
